content: 2 egap the original easy goes it pattern was published in 2017 in size fingering weight yarn it s been modified for all the dk 56 x 10 small lovers i ve included a small version using 100 grams that 86 x 15 large makes a little shawlette and a larger version using 200 sizes based on just lying flat to grams for a big cozy shawl all instructions for the larger dry pin blocking would stretch shawl will be in red just like the original no blocking them considerably required perfect for a quick gift gauge in stockinette 18 sts / 36 row = 4 you can find the original version in fingering weight on my not important to pattern website as well great for those 400 yard skeins enjoy only yarn usage yarn requirements dk worsted weight 100 to 200 grams 230 to 460 yards suggested needle size us 8 / 5 0 mm other supplies tapestry needle abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit kfb knit into the front and back of the stitch k2tog knit 2 stitches together p purl rs right side sl1k slip one stitch knit wise sts stitches ws wrong side yo yarn over 3 egap co 3 row 1 rs kfb knit to end 4 sts row 2 ws k1 k2tog kfb 4 sts row 1 rs kfb knit to last stitch p1 5 sts row 2 ws sl1k k2tog knit to last stitch kfb 5 sts repeat row 1 and 2 an additional 23 35 times 28/40 sts row 1 rs kfb knit to last stitch p1 29/41 sts row 2 ws sl1k k2tog purl to last stitch kfb 29/41 sts row 3 kfb knit to last stitch p1 30/42 sts row 4 sl1k k2tog purl to last stitch kfb 30/42 sts row 5 kfb knit to last stitch p1 31/43 sts row 6 sl1k k2tog knit to last stitch kfb 31/43 sts row 7 kfb knit to last stitch p1 32/44 sts row 8 sl1k k2tog purl to last stitch kfb 32/44 sts row 9 kfb knit to last stitch p1 33/45 sts row 10 sl1k k2tog purl to last stitch kfb 33/45 sts row 11 kfb knit to last stitch p1 34/46 sts row 12 sl1k k2tog knit to last stitch kfb 34/46 sts row 13 kfb knit to last stitch p1 35/47 sts row 14 sl1k k2tog purl to last stitch kfb 35/47 sts row 15 kfb knit to last stitch p1 36/48 sts row 16 sl1k k2tog purl to last stitch kfb 36/48 sts row 1 rs kfb knit to last stitch p1 37/49 sts row 2 ws sl1k k2tog knit to last stitch kfb 37/49 sts repeat row 1 and 2 an additional 13 17 times 50/66 sts 4 egap row 1 rs kfb knit to last stitch p1 51/67 sts row 2 ws sl1k k2tog k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * to last stitch kfb 51/67 sts row 3 kfb knit to last
